description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Hi, my name is Matt Bernstein, successful Udemy instructor with over 45,000+ students across 186 countries. But, I'm going to make the proper assumption that you have no idea who I am.

So listen, I have a booming voice and like to get straight to the point.

At the end of the course you'll learn how toâ€¦

  • Design a WordPress website to market Udemy courses (no coding knowledge needed).
  • Build an email list and email followup series.
  • Profit more money from existing sales channels.

There are minimal costs selling Udemy video courses on your WordPress website. You only need to buy a domain name and monthly website hosting plan.

Who should take this course? Who should not?

  • Students with full-time incomes, who want to supplement with a part-time passive income, marketing Udemy courses.
  • Students must develop patience and discipline to know that success does not happen overnight, you have to put in the work.

As a very small token of my appreciation:

When you scroll down the page, you'll see some lectures are available to watch for free.

You'll get a look over my shoulder (step by step guide) to learn exactly how I designed a WordPress website to market Udemy courses.
title: Udemy Marketing: Build a WordPress Website - Unofficial
